This folder contains libraries and source code imported from other projects.

In all cases the licences are compatible with Project Azalea's.

ACPICA: 
-------

ACPICA can be downloaded from https://acpica.org/downloads, and licensing information can be found on the same website.
The BSD licensed version is used here - copyright and licence information can be found in each of the source code
files.
 
GoogleTest:
-----------

Provided on GitHub at https://github.com/google/googletest. Permissively licensed - see 
googletest/googletest/LICENSE.txt for details.

libcxxrt:
---------

Provided on GitHub at https://github.com/pathscale/libcxxrt. BSD Licensed - see libcxxrt-master/LICENSE.txt for
details, or the same is reproduced in each individual source file.

Only the RTTI portion of the code is currently used, and some excess code is commented out and some excess files
deleted compared to the original version.

vsnprintf:
----------
This is a lightly modified version of the original software at http://www.jhweiss.de/software/snprintf.html. It is
informally licensed in a way that permits free usage - see the top of vsnprintf.cpp for details.
